title: Cozy 1 Bedroom Cottage! Vintage! Stand Alone! Hurry on this One!
posting_body: ['***', 'If You Are Reading this Ad, THE UNIT IS STILL AVAILABLE.', ' Please Follow Directions.', 'Thanks!', '*', '**', 'Rent $1,495  Dep.', '$1,495  Lease .Water / Garbage PAID.', 'Approx 380 sq ft. Available NOW.', 'Location:  San Leandro Fairmont District in working class neighborhood. .', 'Seldom Available --- Small 1 bedroom Cottage.', ' Older Property with basic amenities.', 'Closet Space Galore.', ' Very Quiet complex filled with professionals.', 'We are looking for the same from the next tenant.', ' Applicant must be upstanding person, currently employed, been on the job 2+ years and meet standard application guidelines.', ' No Pets / No Prior Evictions /', 'No BK.', ' Background Check Performed.', ' PRINCIPALS ONLY!', ' NO THIRD PARTY INQUIRIES.', 'Please Follow Directions', 'At The Bottom to be Considered.', '1 Bedroom  Cottage *  Stall Shower *  Clean * Quiet * New Paint  * New Vinyl * Quaint *', '*Cable Ready *  Off Street Parking *  By BART / BUS * AVAILABLE Now*', 'For consideration, please email us your background information (where you live now and for how long; why you are moving; how many is this for; where do you work and how long have you been there, contact number etc) and we will follow up with you  and instructions to preview and fill out an application if desired.', 'Thanks.']
